name: Salesman Itemwise Commission
query:
select 
si.name as "InvoiceNo:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
si.posting_date as "Date:Date:120",
sit.item_name as "Item Name:Data:150",
sit.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:150",
si.base_net_total as "Sales Amount:Currency:130",
ti.salesman_commission_cf*base_net_total as "Salesman Commission:Currency:150",
ti.supervisor_commission_cf*base_net_total as "Supervisor Commission:Currency:150",
ti.manager_commission_cf*base_net_total as "Manager Commission:Currency:150"
from `tabSales Invoice` as si 
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` as sit 
on  si.name = sit.parent
and si.docstatus = 1
inner join `tabItem` as ti
on sit.item_code = ti.item_code
